definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to concentrate/to centralize/to focus/centralized/concentrated/to put together

sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 这些中药中就有生长于云南和贵州的茯苓。

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他专心一志地做生意，在几年中就赚到许多钱。

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出产性活动己的总称能够举行。

sentences.english: That's the lowest -ranking officer position in most banks.
sentences.chinese: 助理司库是大多数银行中主管级别中最低的一级。

sentences.english: That's the lowest -ranking officer position in most banks.
sentences.chinese: 助理司库是大多数银行中主管级别中最低的一级。

sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如果在整治中发现了更加有害的产品呢？

sentences.english: He pillaged the country of its treasures and of its best people.
sentences.chinese: 他掠夺了这个国家的财富和百姓中的精英。

sentences.english: In our consulting practice, we reverse the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的咨询实践中，我们改变了程序。

sentences.english: Seahorses like to live in shallow waters amongst the seaweed and eelgrass.
sentences.chinese: 海马喜欢住在海藻或鳗草丛中的浅海。

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使计算机能够从文本中提取意义的过程。

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".
sentences.chinese: 广西北部湾经济区在泛北经济合作中具有战略地位。

sentences.english: There is no doubt he is the "Rock Star" CEO.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，他就是传说中的“摇滚明星式”CEO。

sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.
sentences.chinese: 张靓颖在超级女声的比赛中表演过这首歌。

sentences.english: They're weighed and fed automatically into mixers.
sentences.chinese: 用料称好重量之后，被自动送入搅拌机中。

sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提货单是国际贸易和船运中一种很重要的单据。

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在农业中占很大部分的是种植业和畜牧业。

definition: to hit the target/to hit the nail on the head

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Zhongdu, capital of China during the Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), modern day Beijing
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
